snp3.10:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
snp3.10:1.3: Atha kho kokāliko bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho kokāliko bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
snp3.10:1.4: “pāpicchā, bhante, sāriputtamoggallānā, pāpikānaṁ icchānaṁ vasaṁ gatā”ti.
snp3.10:2.1: Evaṁ vutte, bhagavā kokālikaṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca:
snp3.10:3.2: tatiyampi kho kokāliko bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
snp3.10:3.3: “kiñcāpi me, bhante, bhagavā saddhāyiko paccayiko, atha kho pāpicchāva sāriputtamoggallānā, pāpikānaṁ icchānaṁ vasaṁ gatā”ti.
snp3.10:3.4: Tatiyampi kho bhagavā kokālikaṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca:
snp3.10:4.1: Atha kho kokāliko bhikkhu uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
snp3.10:4.2: Acirappakkantassa ca kokālikassa bhikkhuno sāsapamattīhi piḷakāhi sabbo kāyo phuṭo ahosi;
snp3.10:4.3: sāsapamattiyo hutvā muggamattiyo ahesuṁ; muggamattiyo hutvā kaḷāyamattiyo ahesuṁ; kaḷāyamattiyo hutvā kolaṭṭhimattiyo ahesuṁ; kolaṭṭhimattiyo hutvā kolamattiyo ahesuṁ; kolamattiyo hutvā āmalakamattiyo ahesuṁ; āmalakamattiyo hutvā beḷuvasalāṭukamattiyo ahesuṁ; beḷuvasalāṭukamattiyo hutvā billamattiyo ahesuṁ; billamattiyo hutvā pabhijjiṁsu; pubbañca lohitañca pagghariṁsu.
snp3.10:4.4: Atha kho kokāliko bhikkhu tenevābādhena kālamakāsi.
snp3.10:4.5: Kālaṅkato ca kokāliko bhikkhu padumaṁ nirayaṁ upapajji sāriputtamoggallānesu cittaṁ āghātetvā.
snp3.10:5.1: Atha kho brahmā sahampati abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho brahmā sahampati bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
snp3.10:5.3: kālaṅkato ca, bhante, kokāliko bhikkhu padumaṁ nirayaṁ upapanno sāriputtamoggallānesu cittaṁ āghātetvā”ti.
snp3.10:5.5: idaṁ vatvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
snp3.10:6.1: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi:
snp3.10:6.2: “imaṁ, bhikkhave, rattiṁ brahmā sahampati abhikkantāya rattiyā …pe…
snp3.10:6.3: idamavoca, bhikkhave, brahmā sahampati, idaṁ vatvā maṁ padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyī”ti.
snp3.10:7.1: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
snp3.10:7.2: “kīvadīghaṁ nu kho, bhante, padume niraye āyuppamāṇan”ti?
snp3.10:7.4: taṁ na sukaraṁ saṅkhātuṁ ettakāni vassāni iti vā ettakāni vassasatāni iti vā ettakāni vassasahassāni iti vā ettakāni vassasatasahassāni iti vā”ti.
snp3.10:8.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho; tato puriso vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena ekamekaṁ tilaṁ uddhareyya.
snp3.10:8.2: Khippataraṁ kho so bhikkhu vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho iminā upakkamena parikkhayaṁ pariyādānaṁ gaccheyya, na tveva eko abbudo nirayo.
snp3.10:8.3: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati abbudā nirayā evameko nirabbudo nirayo.
snp3.10:8.4: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati nirabbudā nirayā evameko ababo nirayo.
snp3.10:8.5: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati ababā nirayā evameko aṭaṭo nirayo.
snp3.10:8.6: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati aṭaṭā nirayā evameko ahaho nirayo.
snp3.10:8.7: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati ahahā nirayā evameko kumudo nirayo.
snp3.10:8.8: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati kumudā nirayā evameko sogandhiko nirayo.
snp3.10:8.9: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati sogandhikā nirayā evameko uppalako nirayo.
snp3.10:8.10: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati uppalakā nirayā evameko puṇḍarīko nirayo.
snp3.10:8.11: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati puṇḍarīkā nirayā evameko padumo nirayo.
snp3.10:8.12: Padumaṁ kho pana bhikkhu nirayaṁ kokāliko bhikkhu upapanno sāriputtamoggallānesu cittaṁ āghātetvā”ti.
snp3.10:8.14: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
